title: Bug 14632StringFieldEditor validation strategy mechanism does not work properly
description: Bug 14632StringFieldEditor validation strategy mechanism does not work properly
OB: The validateStrategy variable is used in getTextControl()to hook up listenersto perform validation.The method setValidationStrategy(int) sets the value of this variable but doesnot unhook and rehook the appropriate listeners.Also, there is not way of passing the validation strategy value using aconstructor.This means that the only available stragety is validation on key press.
